component.name: mailbox-preview
component.summary: List new email messages in an IMAP or local mailbox

description.p: mailbox-preview is a command-line program that peeks at an IMAP mailbox and uses scan to display a summary, one line per new message. Local mailboxes are also supported: Maildir directories and any single-file format scan supports (mbox and MMDF). Use mailbox-preview stand-alone on the command line or as the back-end of xlbiff.
